pkgmetadata.longdescription: Build Formulas Using Tidy Selection Helpers // Provides the function 'tidyformula()', which translates formulas containing 'tidyselect'-style selection helpers. It expands these helpers by evaluating 'dplyr::select()' with the relevant selection helper and a supplied data frame. The package contains methods for traversing abstract syntax trees from Wickham, Hadley (2019) doi:10.1201/9781351201315.
